attributes.action: Suspend Sir James Crosby the Deputy Chairman of the FSA with immediate effect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir James Crosby the former CEO at HBOS and now Deputy Chairman of the FSA should be suspended with immediate effect. Sir James was head of HBOS until July 2006, he was at the helm when the banks excessive risk taking was taking place, it was he who ignored and then dismissed Paul Moore former Head of Risk at the bank, after Mr Moore had given successive warnings about the risks!

rejection.details: Since the submission of this petition, Sir James Crosby has resigned from the FSA.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
